alert.note: Alert for Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 3:59PM MST until September 15 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Navajo County in north central Arizona... * Until 445 PM MST. * At 358 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of East Sunset Mesa, or 12 miles south of Winslow, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Navajo County. This includes State Route 99 between mile markers 28 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
